channel.title: How can I enable ableton link and how it works?
channel.description: I bought ableton and I wanted to know how can I enable ableton link in Auxy because I really don’t know. And if you can you can tell me what it does. I hope you can help me.

item.title: How can I enable ableton link and how it works?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
You can read (and watch) what Link does on Ableton’s site: https://www.ableton.com/en/link/

https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fjb4U-cUGSE

https://www.youtube.com/embed/E5gKYx3EzW0

You can enable it in Auxy via the ‘nut’ menu in the top-right corner, and in Ableton by following this guide: https://help.ableton.com/hc/en-us/articles/209776125-Link-features-functions-and-FAQ

https://www.youtube.com/embed/_Jzz6GKdcFA

There have been a number of bugs since Auxy 5.3 (six months ago!), so your mileage might vary.
I haven’t been able to use it without swearing often and loudly…

In the interim, you might want to check out IDAM (Inter-Device Audio & MIDI):

https://www.youtube.com/embed/WIf1P7n3Eqk

Or just rely on Auxy’s Ableton export.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I enable ableton link and how it works?
